projects.name: ChiknTindr
projects.short_description: ChiknTindir is a MERN full-stack app designed to allow you to end the egg-scruciating conversation of where you and your friends want to go to dinner. Game. Set. Match. Eat.

projects.name: SoyVeg
projects.short_description: SoyVeg is a full-stack web applications utilizing NodeJs, ExpressJs, and a PostgreSQL database to target the Edamam API.
